name: DOOMSDAY (itch) (Circumpunk)
description:
We are on the edge of DOOMSDAY as an almost unstoppable creature has begun to attack earth. All law enforcement, armies and even the superheroes haven't been able to stop it. With no option left the president contacts the worlds most dangerous Supervillain, Dr Doomstar, a brilliant engineer known for building the most planet crushing doomsday weapons. If she can defeat the foe then she will save the world and also gain her freedom.

Firing the weapon has recoil so massive it will blow you out of the stage. Set up forcefields at the edge of the stage before firing to keep from being blown to kingdom come.

Controls:

WASD / LTS - Move/Aim

LMB /RT - Fire (Hold to charge and fire)

SPACE/ A - Jump (up to 3 times)

Shift/ X - Sprint

Q/ LB - Switch Weapon

Hey everyone and welcome to my VimJam 2 entry for Boss / On the Edge. This is a challenging fast paced shooter with probably your enemies doing more of the shooting than you.

There was so much I had to skip due to over scoping as usual, including a mechanic where the Lackeybot could show up and catch you from being blown out of the edge. Hopefully its still fun and enjoyable. Just be ready with those weapon switches when Lackeybot advises them.

As always, thanks for checking it out.

Game designed in Unity by Circumpunk-KKB
